{{Wired embedded system |brand=Edgewater Networks |model=EdgeMarc 4200 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=SerComm |pcb_id=MR00F-1.6mm |type=router |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Intel XScale |cpu1_model=IXP422;FWIXP422BB, L4100385, INTEL (M)(C)2002, Z412T006A, 412 KOREA; |cpu1_cspeed=266 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=TE28F128J3C-150 |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W982516BH-75 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_minipci_num=1 |serial=yes,, console port,, DE-9,, (9600 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Kendin |sw_model=KS8995XA;KENDIN, KS8995XA, 0406B, AMK3281080, 1476440; |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2-Wire RTC;Xicor;X1205;;1; ,,, 30V P-Channel MOSFET;Semtron Micro;STP9435M;;2; ,,, Dual Operational Amplifier;National Semiconductor;LM358M;;1; ,,, RS-232 Transciever;Intersil;HIN213ECA;HIN, 213ECA, L0410GBWH;1; ,,, Dual PWM Controller With SCP/DTC Function;Feeling Tech;FP5452;;1; ,,, 1A Low Dropout Linear Regulator;Advanced Analog Circuits;AZ1117H;;1; ,,, 1.5A, Low Voltage Î¼Cap LDO Regulator;Micrel;MIC37152;M 37152, BR, 0219 MAL;1; |flags=RTC w/ battery backup, metal case, |stock_boot=RedBoot;1.92; |stock_os=Linux |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=root |default_pass=default |oui_eth=00:C0:02 }} :[ftp://ftp.edgewaternetworks.com/pub/docs/EdgeMarc/4200/4200%20Series%20User%20Manual.pdf User Manual]
"MR00F-1.6mm" is silkscreened on one particular 4200's board. :OEM: [[SerComm]] {{See also|Edgewater}}
